title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.6 - Confirmation of bank balances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.6 - Confirmation of bank balances

State Regulations

Each bank balance maintained by the local agency shall
be confirmed by the depositary as of the closing date of each quarterly period. Such confirmation shall be prepared substantially in accordance with the
specimen form shown as Exhibit 23 of Appendix S-11. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1646-7.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
